channel.title: 2018 04 26 on Zack's Notablog

item.title: Painting of Red Heifer
item.description: I started out with this great photo by James Wheeler. I started out by sketching out the painting, loose white paint on red. The background went very quickly, but I like how it turned out. I spent most of the time on the head, but I think the light colors came out well. If you have a picture that you’d like me to paint, leave a comment below.
